alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Becker; Mahnomen; South Clearwater; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clay, eastern Norman, northwestern Otter Tail, northwestern Wilkin, Mahnomen, western Becker, southwestern Clearwater, southeastern Cass and north central Richland Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 808 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front assocaited with strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gary to near Kragnes to Chaffee. The gusty winds will be ahead of the rain along the gust front. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gary, Ranum and Oakport around 810 PM CDT. Waukon and Averill around 815 PM CDT. Glyndon, Faith and Durbin around 820 PM CDT. Mahnomen around 825 PM CDT. Muskoda and Davenport around 830 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Moorhead Airport, Casselton Airport and West Argusville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 42 and 79. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 323 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Minnesota...and southeastern North Dakota. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northwestern and west central Minnesota...and southeastern North Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Becker; Mahnomen; South Clearwater; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
